mapper.sql: id, config_id, print_type_id, is_enable, user_id, file, create_time, creator, update_time, updator, del_time, deletor, is_delete
mapper.select: SELECT con.print_name ,pt.type_name ,pb.is_enable ,u.name ,pb.creator ,pb.create_time ,pb.updator ,pb.update_time FROM print_bind pb INNER JOIN config con ON pb.config_id = con.id INNER JOIN print_type pt ON pb.print_type_id = pt.id LEFT JOIN user u ON pb.user_id = u.id WHERE pb.config_id = #{configId} AND pb.print_type_id = #{typeId} AND pb.is_enable = #{isEnable} AND pb.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT con.print_name ,pt.type_name ,pb.is_enable ,u.name ,pb.creator ,pb.create_time ,pb.updator ,pb.update_time FROM print_bind pb INNER JOIN config con ON pb.config_id = con.id INNER JOIN print_type pt ON pb.print_type_id = pt.id LEFT JOIN user u ON pb.user_id = u.id
mapper.insert: insert into print_bind (id, config_id, print_type_id, is_enable, user_id, file, create_time, creator, update_time, updator, del_time, deletor, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{configId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{printTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isEnable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT})

config_id = #{configId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
print_type_id = #{printTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
